Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 博物館の受付嬢
Entry.EnglishText: Museum Receptionist

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ・博物館・エントランス
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka - Museum - Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: 博物館・エントランス
Entry.EnglishText: Museum - Entrance

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式前で、カレギアに 興味を持つ人が 増えてきています。
Entry.EnglishText: With the ceremony coming up, more and more people are showing interest in Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: 当博物館もその国民の皆様の ご期待に添えるだけの 展示品があればよいのですが……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope the museum has enough exhibits to meet the expectations of the public...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、なんなのでしょう、 この恐ろしい地響きは……？
Entry.EnglishText: Oooh, what is this horrible shaking...?

Entry.JapaneseText: お客さんがまったく 来なくなってしまいました……
Entry.EnglishText: We stopped getting any sort of visitors...

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it because of the medicine?

Entry.JapaneseText: 倉庫へ行けば、国祖ゴルドバが 飲んでいたという 頭痛薬がありますが……
Entry.EnglishText: If you go to the warehouse, there is a headache medicine that our founder Goldba used to take...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何しろ、何千年も昔のもの…… 効くかどうか……
Entry.EnglishText: But it is thousands of years old... There's no telling whether it will be effective...

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬は見つかりましたか、 そうですか。 よかったです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems you were able to find the medicine. I am glad to hear that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、お客さんが めっきり少なくなりました。
Entry.EnglishText: We've had very few visitors lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街が殺気立っていて、 博物館どころじゃないと 言う事なんでしょうか……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone is saying that there's no point in having a museum since the city is in the midst of a race war...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、お客さんが めっきり少なくなりました。
Entry.EnglishText: We've had very few visitors lately.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街が殺気立っていて、 博物館どころじゃないと 言う事なんでしょうか……
Entry.EnglishText: Everyone is saying that there's no point in having a museum since the city is in the midst of a race war...

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカと言えば、 カレギア城、蒸気機関車、 そして、この博物館。
Entry.EnglishText: When it comes to the capital city of Balka, there's always Callegea Castle, the steam locomotive, and this museum.

Entry.JapaneseText: これと言ったものはありませんが、 お静かに観賞ください。
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing more to add about this place, but please take your time and enjoy the exhibits at your leisure.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我ら祖国について、改めて学ぶ事も たくさんありましょう。 ごゆっくりどうぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: There is still so much you can learn about our country. Please take your time.

Entry.JapaneseText: さしたる所蔵品もなく、 館長も悩んでいるようです。
Entry.EnglishText: The director of our museum seems to be troubled by the lack of artifacts in our collection.

Entry.JapaneseText: 予算はあるのですが、 国内が少々混乱しているようなので、 バイヤーが来てくれないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: We have a decent budget, but with the mess our country is in right now, it's been difficult to bring in any clients.
Entry.Notes: Not sure if it really should be buyers? I would think sellers since they want to expand their collection, but the katakana says buyers.

Entry.JapaneseText: 展示品もできて、 ようやくそれらしくなりました。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like the exhibits are finally ready to be displayed.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、まだまだ私たちも 更なる所蔵品の充実を求め、 たゆまぬ努力を惜しまないつもりです。
Entry.EnglishText: However, we shall spare no effort to further expand our museum's collection.

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆様のお陰で、 ようやく、首都バルカの顔として 誇れるようになりました。
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks to everyone's efforts, we can finally take pride in calling ourselves the face of Balka, the capital city.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの秘宝の数々を ごゆっくり堪能して くださいませ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please take your time to appreciate the many treasures of Callegea.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『カレギア王国・全図』 鉄板打ち出しの立体的な地図。 ペトナジャンカの工場長が 若い頃に作成し、寄贈したもの。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- The Completed Map of Callegea - A three-dimensional map of the Kingdom of Callegea. It was created and donated by the factory manager of Petnadjanka in his youth.
